system.description:
Your studies, often isolated and lonely, have born final fruit, the secret knowledge of the world yours to read like a book. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Wisdom score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain an additional specialty with nature, and the maximum size for an expertise die on nature checks for you is 1d12.
  • You add all spells from the knowledge school to your druid spell list.  
  • The number of druid spells you may prepare at a time is equal to your druid level + 1/2 your scholar level + your wisdom modifier + your intelligence modifier.
